    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Élet a városban</string>
            <string language="en-US">Life in the city</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben in der Stadt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie dans la ville</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida na cidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vita nella città</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή στην πόλη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida en la ciudad</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Jellegzetes városi részlet a városi hangulat, életmód megismerésére</string>
            <string language="en-US">Typical piece of city life to get acquainted with the mood and life-style of the city</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">település</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">város</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">ipar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kereskedelem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kultúra</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Typisches Stück Stadtleben, zum mit der Stimmung 
und dem Lebensstil der Stadt bekannt zu erhalten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Morceau typique de la vie de ville à obtenir au 
courant de l'humeur et du style de vie de la ville</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte típica de vida da cidade a começar 
familiar com o modo e o life-style da cidade</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte tipica di vita della città da ottenere al 
corrente dell'umore e del life-style della città</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικό κομμάτι της ζωής πόλεων που 
εξοικειώνεται με τη διάθεση και τον τρόπο ζωής της πόλης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pedazo típico de vida de la ciudad a conseguir 
conocida con el humor y la forma de vida de la ciudad</string>
          </description>
        </general>
